doc.title: Tempo Tempo Tempo Tempo
doc.plot: In this show, Maria Bethânia recreates four decades of songs with the composers more often present in her career: Chico Buarque (Quem te viu, quem te vê - You have been doing nicely; Olhos nos olhos - Looking at each other's eyes; Teresinha), Caetano Veloso (Oração ao tempo - Prayer to time; Reconvexo - Reconvex; Nossos momentos - Our moments), Gonzaguinha (O que é, o que é? - What is it?), Dona Ivone Lara (Nos combates desta vida - In combats of life), Roberto Mendes (Iluminada - To become illuminated; Estranho rapaz - Strange lad), Rosinha de Valença (Usina de prata - Silver mill)
